articles.description: Sony has decided to postpone a planned PlayStation 5 reveal event scheduled for June 4, saying it wishes to give time to "stand back and allow more important voices to be heard."
articles.content: Update: Sony has postponed the planned PlayStation 5 event indefinitely. Although it did not cite ongoing Black Lives Matter protests as the reason, it did suggest the delay is to "stand back and all… [+3454 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Destiny 2 Year 4 reveal coming June 9 - Polygon
articles.description: A new teaser from Bungie reveals the upcoming reveal date  for the next Destiny 2 expansion. The teaser shows The Drifter flying down to what appears to be Europa, similar to the Eris Morn teaser Bungie took down earlier this week.
articles.content:
Bungie tweeted a new teaser from Destinys Twitter account, featuring The Drifter and officially announcing the reveal date of Destiny 2s next expansion as June 9 at noon EDT. 
This event is only an … [+1704 chars]
